heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Snow likely early, then tapering off from west to east; a trace to 2 inches. Lows in the mid to upper teens in the south, and low to mid teens north, with some single digits far north. Winds becoming variable to southeast at around 5 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Partly cloudy in the morning, then clouds increasing in the afternoon. Chance of late-day snow showers, mainly in New York. Highs from the mid 20s to around 30, except low to mid 30s in the Hudson Valley. Southeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Becoming cloudy. Snow likely, with some wintry mix possible near and south of Route 4; 1 to 4 inches of snow. Lows in the low to mid 20s east of the Greens, and in the St. Lawrence Valley, mid 20s to lower 30s elsewhere west of the Greens. Southeast winds 5 to 15 mph.
